episodes.title: #30 TDP "Recovering from Religious Trauma" featuring  @GenericArtDad  - Grace Lauren Taylor
episodes.description: This week, Chris shares his experiences with recovering from religious trauma."Deconstructing a religion or finding your way out of a high control belief system is incredibly difficult & often isolating especially when you've not been able to develop basic life skills." - Chris  @GenericArtDad  Generic Art Dad - YouTubeGenericArtDad (@genericartdad) | TikTokReligious Abuse is defined by abuse administered under the guise of religion, including harassment or humiliation that may result in psychological trauma.Resources and Research:How to know if you’ve been abused by religion https://www.satyawellnesscollective.com/blog/what-are-the-signs-of-religious-traumahttps://www.1800respect.org.au/violence-and-abuse/spiritual-abuse#:~:text=Spiritual%20abuse%20is%20sometimes%20called,of%20domestic%20and%20family%20violencehttps://www.verywellmind.com/what-is-religious-abuse-6259926https://www.thehotline.org/resources/what-is-spiritual-abuse/https://www.webmd.com/mental-health/signs-spiritual-abuseNarcissistic Religious Abuse Tacticshttps://psychcentral.com/pro/exhausted-woman/2015/05/15-narcissistic-religious-abuse-tacticsPatrick TeahanReligious Abuse VideoReligious Abuse and Cults - Childhood TraumaYouTube · Patrick Teahan LICSW2 WebMDhttps://www.webmd.com/mental-health/signs-spiritual-abuse#:~:text=Religious%20Abuse&text=You%20may%20be%20experiencing%20religious,that%20you%20didn't%20wantChoosing Therapyhttps://www.choosingtherapy.com/spiritual-abuse/#genericartdad #religioustrauma #podcast #trending #mentalhealth #mentalillnessSupport the showNew episodes every Sunday on YouTube, Spotify, and Apple Podcasts!
